contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We're always happy to hear from you!
contact.locationDescription: Literary meetings take place at various locations
contact.hoursDescription1: Events take place in the evening
contact.faqQ1: How can I join the events?
contact.faqA1: All our events are open to everyone. Simply register for an event through the form on our website or write to us.
contact.faqQ2: Do I need to pay to participate?
contact.faqA2: Most of our events are free. We announce special events in advance.
contact.faqQ3: How can I suggest my own event?
contact.faqA3: Use the "Suggest an Event" form on our website or write to us via email.
contact.faqA4: Some events are suitable for family visits. Check the details in the specific event description.
